- Data from several passive acoustic projects on the Belgian continental shelf.
- Gear used are CPOD receivers.
- Habour porpoises (Phocoena phocoena) produce typical narrow-band high frequency sounds (NBHF) and are identified as such.
- Developed and managed by: VLIZ
- Partners: VLIZ, RBINS <br>Period : from 2016-01-01 onwards

Data points are grouped according to selected sample period

[[IMIS metadata record]](https://www.vliz.be/en/imis?module=dataset&dasid=5531)
